data.title: 30 Best Dario Argento Quotes With Image
data.meta_description: 1.Horror is like a serpent; always shedding its skin, always changing. And it will always come back. It can't be hidden away like the guilty secrets we try to keep in our subconscious.2.The essence of horror is not blood
data.text:
1. Dario Argento is known for his influence in the horror genre, particularly in the subgenre of giallo films. However, many may be surprised to learn that his initial career aspirations were actually in music. Argento studied music composition and also worked as a music critic before eventually transitioning to filmmaking.

2. Despite being renowned for his remarkable visual style, Argento is known to have color blindness. This condition does not hinder his ability to create visually striking films, but it is an interesting aspect considering his expertise in crafting vivid and visually appealing scenes.

3. As a filmmaker, Argento is known for his meticulous attention to detail, particularly in the production design and art direction of his films. However, he has an eccentric and somewhat unconventional approach to directing his actors. Rather than providing extensive guidance or dialogue cues, he often uses visual cues or even personal anecdotes to guide their performances.

4. Argento's fascination with the horror genre can be traced back to his childhood. His father, Salvatore Argento, was a well-known film producer, and as a child, Dario was exposed to various films, including horror classics. This early exposure had a profound impact on his artistic vision and shaped his unique take on the genre.
